rows.label: qst300102_msg001
rows.name:
Ah, there you are.
I'll fill you in on the details.

rows.label: qst300102_msg002
rows.name:
What we really need to expand our
activities is to stock up on food
supplies for long-range missions!

rows.label: qst300102_msg003
rows.name:
It's not always possible to find
rations at the destination, so we
have to take our own, just in case.

rows.label: qst300102_msg004
rows.name:
When he was around, Vandham used
to take care of sourcing and managing
the rations all by himself.

rows.label: qst300102_msg005
rows.name:
Without him, we're still figuring
out how to take care of it all.

rows.label: qst300102_msg006
rows.name:
And it's not easy to find
a good solution.

rows.label: qst300102_msg007
rows.name:
While we figure it out, the stocks
we have are depleting fast.

rows.label: qst300102_msg008
rows.name:
So we have to source some more
before they actually run out.

rows.label: qst300102_msg009
rows.name:
So yeah, I'd like you to take care of
collecting ingredients and preparing
some food rations.

rows.label: qst300102_msg010
rows.name:
What do you think?
Can you handle it?

rows.label: qst300102_msg011
rows.name:
Nice! I'll pass on the word to let
you use the cooking equipment
at the Plaza of Reprieve.

rows.label: qst300102_msg012
rows.name:
Once you've got the ingredients, you
can head there and make the rations.

rows.label: qst300102_msg013
rows.name:
It doesn't matter too much what
ingredients you use, just as long
as they'll keep.

rows.label: qst300102_msg014
rows.name: We're all counting on you!

rows.label: qst300102_msg101
rows.name:
Once you've got enough ingredients,
head to the cooking equipment at the
Plaza of Reprieve to make the rations.

rows.label: qst300102_msg102
rows.name: Did you stop by Sadecott Groceries?

rows.label: qst300102_msg103
rows.name:
It's just Memera was asking after you.
Maybe you should go talk to her.

rows.label: qst300102_msg201
rows.name:
Thanks to you, we've got more than
enough rations for the moment!

rows.label: qst300102_msg202
rows.name:
Yeah, we should be fine to send
more members on missions now.

rows.label: qst300102_msg203
rows.name:
Right, I need to sort things out
in the warehouse, so you go
report in to Yuu, would you?
